title: Game Audio Club: Music Share
description:
If you’re into making video game music or sound design (or just curious) come hang out with us once a month! Doesn’t matter if you’re a pro or just starting out— everyone’s welcome. Just bring your love for game audio. We’re a chill group where you can share your work, get feedback, or just vibe with people who love game audio. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312256681/
location: MAP St. Louis Montessori School - 3840 Washington Ave - St. Louis, MO, us

title: Game Club: Webbed
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. This month's game is... Webbed, a physics-y pixel platformer where you play as an adorable little spider!
Come share your thoughts on the game with us! 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311772690
location: Sauce on the Side, 701 N New Ballas Rd, Creve Coeur, MO 63141, USA

title: STLGameDev New Year's Eve Party Mixer w/STLVGM!
description:
Ring in the New Year with creativity, community, and a little friendly competition! STLGameDev and STLVGM are teaming up for a special New Year’s Eve Mixer at Dirty 20 starting at 8:00 PM.
Whether you make games, make music, or just love the scene, come hang out, network, and celebrate with fellow developers and audio artists from around St. Louis. We’ll have old-school multiplayer Mario Kart set up, so bring your best drifting skills and get ready to battle it out retro-style.
Let’s kick off the new year with pixels, playlists, and plenty of power-ups!
 
For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312397463/
location: Dirty 20 Bar, 14051 Manchester Rd, Ballwin, MO 63011, USA

title: Global Game Jam 2026
description:
We are excited to announce Global Game Jam 2026! Come team up with local creators and make a game over the weekend! This event is open to ALL (even remote friends).  Students from any campus are welcome!

Online and In-Person participants are both welcome.  We will be using our community-run Discord server to handle announcements and online participation.  Join here! 

Registration for Global Game Jam is now open!
location: Millennium Student Center, 17 Arnold B Grobman Dr, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA
